THE cause of Toddlers & Tiaras star, Kailia Posey's death at the young age of 16 has now been revealed to The Sun.
The teen beauty queen hanged herself at the state park where her body was found… [+5699 chars]

articles.title: Previously unseen 2004 portrait of Queen Elizabeth is unveiled to mark her Platinum Jubilee - Daily Mail
articles.description: The photograph, which seems almost to catch her off-guard, was taken by Rob Munday nearly 19 years ago during a photoshoot to create the first commissioned 3D hologram of the Queen.
articles.content:
Her Majesty is amused smiling quizzically in a new portrait unveiled to mark her Platinum Jubilee. 
As the Duchess of Cambridge met fashion industry stars and models at a British design event yester… [+2694 chars]

articles.title: 13 Star Wars games worth buying during May the 4th sales - Polygon
articles.description: It’s Star Wars season, and several game platforms are having massive May the 4th sales. We’ve combed through each, picking out games like Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, Battlefront 2, and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic that are worth picking up.
articles.content: In honor of May the 4th, otherwise known as Star Wars day, there are special sales on Star Wars games all over the galaxy (well, mainly on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbo… [+2417 chars]
